#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#define M 1000000007
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

int d[200005],isprime[100005];

void prime(){

    for (int i=1;i<100005;i++){
        isprime[i]=1 ;
    }
    isprime[1]=0 ;

    for(int i=2;i<100005;i++)
    {
        if (isprime[i])
        for (int j=2*i;j<100005;j=j+i)
        isprime[j] = 0 ;
     }
}

int main(){
int t,a,b,n,i,j,temp;
cin>>t;
prime();
while(t--){
    cin>>a>>b;
    n=b-a+1;
     for (i=1;i<=n;i++){
        d[i]=0;
    }

    for(i=1;i<=sqrt(b);i++){
        temp=a/i;
        temp=temp*i;
        for(j=temp;j<=b;j=j+i){
            if (j<a) continue ;

            if(i>sqrt(j)) continue ;

            if ((i*i)==j) d[j-a+1]++;
            else d[j-a+1] += 2 ;
         }
    }
    int cnt=0;

    for (i=1;i<=n;i++){
        if (isprime[ d[i]]) cnt++;
    }
    cout<<cnt<<endl ;
}
return 0;
}
